name: Storn Crag-Strider

aspects.high_concept: Dunmer Blacksmith Forging Trust One Blade at a Time
aspects.trouble: Dunmer in a City That Barely Tolerates Outsiders
other_aspects: Steel Does Not Care What Race Holds It
Pride in Craft Above All Else

stunts: Armorer's Craft: +2 to Crafts (Smithing) when forging, repairing, or improving weapons and armor.
Sturdy as Steel: +2 to Physique when resisting fatigue, exhaustion, or physical stress from labor or hardship.
Eye of the Smith: Once per scene, examine a weapon or piece of armor to identify its origin, quality, or any hidden flaws or enchantments.

equipment.special: Master-quality smithing tools, stock of steel and ebony ingots

personality_notes.speaking_style: Quiet and direct; lets his work speak for him. Wary with strangers initially but opens up to those who respect his craft. Slight Dunmeri accent.
motivations: Produce the finest weapons and armor in Haafingar
Earn the respect and steady coin that keeps him secure in Solitude
Preserve Dunmeri smithing traditions alongside Nord techniques
Avoid entanglement in the civil war
fears: Solitude's prejudice turning into open hostility against Dunmer
Losing his forge if the city falls in the civil war
Being forced to smith weapons for a cause he doesn't believe in
Inferior materials or rushed work ruining his reputation
quirks: Tests the edge of any blade he makes before handing it over
Keeps a small Dunmeri ancestor shrine hidden behind his forge
Speaks more freely after a customer proves they know their weapons

relationships.Solitude Guard: Toleratedâ€”his quality work earns grudging respect from soldiers
relationships.Castle Dour Armory: Supplier of repair work and custom pieces for the garrison
relationships.Erikur Silver-Maned: Occasional trading partner for rare metals; distrusts him personally
relationships.Dunmer Community: Informal point of contact for the small Dunmer population in Solitude
relationships.Player: Welcomes characters who treat him with equal respect regardless of race

advancement_triggers: Bring rare materials or a challenging commission (+2)
Treat him with respect as an equal (+1)
Defend him or other Dunmer from prejudice (+2)
setback_triggers: Disrespect his craft or his race (-2)
Shortchange him or attempt to cheat him (-1)

trust_benefits.3: Storn offers discounted repairs and access to standard stock at fair prices
trust_benefits.6: Storn crafts custom masterwork pieces and shares knowledge of Dunmeri smithing techniques

scene_triggers: Sourcing rare metals or specialized weapons
notes: Storn Crag-Strider is one of the few Dunmer craftsmen who has made a stable life in Solitude, earning his place through exceptional skill rather than social ease. He is a quiet but perceptive figure who misses little of what happens near his forge. Characters who respect both his craft and his dignity will find a loyal and skilled ally.
gm_notes: Storn provides practical smithing services and a Dunmer perspective on life in Haafingar. His forge near Castle Dour positions him as a natural information source on garrison activity. His hidden ancestor shrine can become a story hook involving Dunmeri culture, ancestral spirits, or unwanted attention from the Thalmor.
